Notes

10th anniversary edition of the album. Drawing cover; totally new drawing on the back; UV coated sleeve; gatefold with liner notes by Jordan Ferguson, containing an excerpt from his book Donuts 33 1/3 about the making of the album. Track C4 is misprinted as "Anti-American Graffifi" on label.
